content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Chloe, an exquisite 4-bedroom chalet nestled in the prestigious Monte Olimpo residential area of Jávea, just minutes from the golden sands of Arenal beach. This stunning 165m² villa sits on a generous 1000m² plot, offering the perfect blend of luxury, privacy, and Mediterranean lifestyle that defines the very best of Costa Blanca living.

Designed by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, Villa Chloe showcases contemporary elegance with meticulous attention to detail. The property features spacious open-plan living areas, three modern bathrooms, and a private pool surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens. With its prime location in one of Jávea's most sought-after neighborhoods, this turnkey villa represents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers seeking a premium Mediterranean retreat.

locationSection.intro:
The Monte Olimpo area of Jávea represents one of the most prestigious addresses on the Costa Blanca, offering residents an exclusive lifestyle in one of Spain's most beautiful coastal towns. Located in the Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar district, this elevated position provides stunning views while maintaining easy access to Jávea's renowned beaches, restaurants, and amenities. The area is characterized by luxury villas, pristine streets, and a peaceful residential atmosphere that attracts international buyers seeking the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle.

Jávea itself is considered the jewel of the northern Costa Blanca, blessed with over 320 days of sunshine annually and a unique microclimate protected by the surrounding Montgó Natural Park. The town seamlessly blends traditional Spanish charm with modern amenities, offering world-class restaurants, championship golf courses, and some of the Mediterranean's most beautiful beaches. Its strategic location provides excellent connectivity to Valencia and Alicante airports, making it easily accessible for international residents and visitors.
highlights: Just 7 minutes drive to the famous Arenal beach and bustling port area
Located in the exclusive Monte Olimpo residential district with luxury villas

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Chloe exemplifies modern Mediterranean architecture with its thoughtful two-storey design that maximizes both indoor and outdoor living spaces. Every element has been carefully planned to create a harmonious flow between the interior spaces and the stunning outdoor areas, while premium finishes and high-quality construction ensure lasting beauty and minimal maintenance.

3 modern bathrooms, with en-suite facilities in master and guest bedrooms
165m² of elegant living space across two thoughtfully designed floors
Open-plan living, dining, and kitchen area with floor-to-ceiling windows
Private swimming pool surrounded by landscaped Mediterranean gardens
1000m² plot providing privacy and space for outdoor entertainment
Fully fitted modern kitchen with high-end appliances and finishes
Built-in wardrobes throughout and premium flooring materials
Multiple terraces and outdoor spaces for year-round enjoyment
Turnkey delivery with all finishing touches completed to the highest standards

content.investmentSection:
Villa Chloe represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Europe's most desirable coastal property markets. Jávea's property market has demonstrated consistent growth over the past decade, driven by its unique combination of natural beauty, excellent climate, and strong international demand. The Monte Olimpo area, in particular, has seen significant appreciation due to its prestigious location and limited supply of luxury properties, making this villa an excellent choice for both lifestyle and investment purposes.

The Spanish property market offers numerous advantages for international investors, including favorable tax structures, established legal frameworks, and strong rental yields in premium locations like Jávea. Properties of this caliber in Monte Olimpo command premium rental rates during the high season, with many owners achieving returns of 6-8% annually through selective holiday rentals. Additionally, Spain's Golden Visa program provides residency opportunities for qualifying property investments, adding further value for international buyers seeking European residence.

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there additional costs?
faqs.answer: Villa Chloe is priced at €1,285,000. Additional costs typically include 10% IVA (VAT), notary fees, registration fees, and legal costs, totaling approximately 12-13% of the purchase price.

faqs.question: How close is the property to Arenal beach and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is just 7 minutes by car from the famous Arenal beach in Jávea. Local amenities, restaurants, and services are within walking distance in the Monte Olimpo area.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international buyers?
faqs.answer: The process involves obtaining an NIE number, legal due diligence, signing a reservation contract with deposit, and completing at notary. We provide full guidance and can recommend trusted legal representatives throughout.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno to provide mortgage solutions for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer up to 70% financing for non-residents with competitive rates.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does this property have?
faqs.answer: Properties in Monte Olimpo achieve excellent rental yields of 6-8% annually. The premium location and luxury finish make it highly attractive for holiday rentals and long-term lets.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Villa Chloe is delivered as a turnkey property, completely finished and ready for immediate occupation upon completion of purchase.

faqs.question: What exactly is included in the sale price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the fully finished villa, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, fitted kitchen with appliances, built-in wardrobes, air conditioning, and all finishing touches.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Chloe?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to arrange a viewing. We can accommodate both in-person visits and virtual tours for international clients, and provide full property documentation.

content.conclusion: Villa Chloe offers a rare opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise in one of Jávea's most prestigious locations. With its perfect combination of luxury, location, and investment potential, this exceptional property won't remain available for long. Contact our team today to arrange your private viewing and take the first step towards your Costa Blanca dream.
